statements: DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'New York' AND vehicle_count > 1000
DELETE FROM CongestionPatterns WHERE congestion_level >= 3 AND suggested_action = 'Implement Traffic Diversions'
DELETE FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND incident_location = 'Highway 101';
